title: Client is repairing for no reason??
body: I just watched a replay file (.rofl) somebody sent to me and in the next game I queued up for during the load screen the game just crashed and said there isn an issue with my installation and started this repair bull shit. I got a loss for it in ranked and it says it's gonna take forever and I am 100% sure there is no issue with the installation. How do I stop it? I tried restarting the client.

replies.body: Yeeeaaa it definitely sounds like your client noticed some damaged or missing game files along the way after watching that replay. Repairing is its way of making sure you're still able to run the game properly at all. It's best to let those repairs finish, but if it keeps happening then try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **force repatch**.
Every time you spectate someone else's replay, the game does a full repair afterwards. Dont know why this happens but you're not the only one, this happens to everyone.
